This example vignette compares the pipeline with and without XCIR for 14 1000g 
subjects.
```{r}
datafolder <- "~/workspace/XCI/data/comparaison/"
vcf_file <- file.path(datafolder, "c-compareX.chrX.vcf")
anno_file <- "~/workspace/XCI/test_siteRef.tsv.anno"
```
```{r}
library(XCIR)
dt <- readXVcf(vcf_file)
dt_anno <- addAnno(dt, anno_file)
```
